name: SiloKitchen
0:
”Alexa, open silo”
”Alexa, ask silo to label my container”
”Alexa, ask silo if my chicken still good”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silo
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the most out of your Silo Vacuum Sealing System with the Silo Kitchen skill for Alexa. This skill lets you:
Use Voice Labeling: Just tell Alexa what you’re storing as you seal it.
Check Food Status: Ask Alexa how long your food will last.
